module.p: dearg red is a simple adjective.

leabhar dearg a red book –
A Mhàiri, ann an leatsa a tha an leabhar dearg seo? Chan an. Sin an leabhar aig Seumas. ’S ann gorm a tha an leabhar agamsa.
Mary – is this read book yours? No, it isn’t. That is James’ book. My book is blue. td. 33

còta dearg a red coat –
Tha còta dubh air a’ chaileig seo ach ’s e còta dearg a tha air Màiri.
This girl has a black coat on but it’s a red coat that Mary has on. td. 40
